channel.title: Object
channel.description: Does Some1 Got A fix for mage bank webs so uu cuts it and NOT a teleport?

item.title: Object
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

lol i hate that “teleport” stuff, its noobish, so i made this for myself, and now im sharing with you:

if(objectID == 733){//Webs skillX = objectX; skillY = objectY; deletethatobject(objectX,objectY); sendMessage("You slash the web apart."); makeGlobalObject(objectX,objectY,734,-3,10); }The object’s direction may not be good when you cut it, and there may be other object id for that web, just modify it. To know where to put this, search your client.java for “if(objectID ==” And put it there somewhere.

You could make a slash weapon requirement for it, just put an if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ID) there.
You can also put an emote into it, i dont know which emote ID though…

Now THIS is the clever way to do it.

Read full topic

@kupo wrote:

Nope you just have to make it only work by requiring they have a weapon with them.
